Structs/UserDefault.html.name: UserDefault
Structs/UserDefault.html.abstract: A type safe property wrapper to set and get values from UserDefaults with support for defaults values.

Protocols.html#/s:7Persist17PropertyList.name: PropertyListValue
Protocols.html#/s:7Persist17PropertyList.abstract: A type than can be stored in UserDefaults.

Extensions/UserDefaults.html#/s:So14NSUs.name: value(forKey:)
Extensions/UserDefaults.html#/s:So14NSUs.abstract: Retrieve value in UserDefaults for key. Returns nil if key does not exist.

Enums/ScratchPad.html#/s:7Persist10Scrat.name: object
Enums/ScratchPad.html#/s:7Persist10Scrat.abstract: Proxy for the stored object. Returns the first object if used on a list, nil when empty

Enums/ScratchPad.html#/s:7Persist10Scrat.name: array
Enums/ScratchPad.html#/s:7Persist10Scrat.abstract: Proxy for the stored objects. Returns an empty array if empty.

Enums/PersistenceError.html#/s:7Persist1.name: noObjectsMatchingPredicate
Enums/PersistenceError.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Did not find any objects matching a given predicate

Classes/UserDefaultsProperty.html#/s:7Pe.name: value
Classes/UserDefaultsProperty.html#/s:7Pe.abstract: Store/Retrieve a value for the given key in the UserDefaults

Classes/Storage.html#/s:7Persist7Storage.name: store(_:to:as:)
Classes/Storage.html#/s:7Persist7Storage.abstract: Store an encodable struct to the specified directory on disk

Classes/Storage.html#/s:7Persist7Storage.name: retrieve(_:from:as:)
Classes/Storage.html#/s:7Persist7Storage.abstract: Retrieve and convert an Object from a file on disk

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: init(container:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Initialize a new CoreData client with a persistent container

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: storeURLs
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: URLs for the persistent stores.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: decodeJSON(_:with:to:in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Decodes an instance of the indicated type.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: decodeJSON(_:with:to:in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Decodes an array of the indicated type.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: decodePlist(_:with:to:in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Decodes an instance of the indicated type.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: decodePlist(_:with:to:in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Decodes an array of the indicated type.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: encodeToJSON(scratchPad:with:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Encodes the object(s) in the given ScratchPad to JSON.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: encodeToPlist(scratchPad:with:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Encodes the object(s) in the given ScratchPad to a Plist.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: defaultContainer
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: A default NSPersistentContainer

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: inMemoryContainer
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: An NSPersistentContainer with a store of type NSInMemoryStoreType

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: cloudKitContainer
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: An NSPersistentCloudKitContainer

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: viewContext
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: The managed object context associated with the main queue. (read-only)

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: newBackgroundContext()
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Creates a private managed object context.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: save(scratchPad:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Saves the underlying NSManagedObjectContext in a ScratchPad

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: objects(for:in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Returns a ScratchPad of containing an array of objects that meet the criteria specified by a given fetch request.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: object(for:in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Returns a ScratchPad of containing a single object that meet the criteria specified by a given fetch request.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: object(_:in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Fetches the requested object from the specified context.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: deleteObjects(ofType:in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Deletes all objects of the given type from the specified context.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: deleteObjects(in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Deletes all objects in the given scratchpad.

Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.name: new(_:in:)
Classes/CoreDataClient.html#/s:7Persist1.abstract: Instantiates a new object of the given type using the specified context.
